div.div: Mean (+ s.e.) breeding date of the genotypes in the sex by age classes of the barn swallow.
div.p: Numbers in the body of the graphs are sample sizes. Breeding date data of the single Q 7/Q 8 older female or male (denoted by 1*) are reported for completeness but are not included in the statistical analyses. The difference between yearling female Q 7/Q 7 and Q 7/Q 8 was significant (P < 0.05, see Results).
